Project Profile

Haworth Shanghai Head Office

WELL Office

Shanghai, China

Silver Featured China
  • Profile
  • Team
  • Photos
  • Media
Description

With the new Asia Pacific showroom space, Haworth will demonstrate its leadership position in regards to product solutions, knowledge and design. Fully demonstrating Haworth’s Organic Spaces vision for its employees and its clients, the space will be an example of wellness, sustainability, creative thinking and beautiful design. It will be multi-dimensional (textiles, lighting, settings) and multi-functional (work types, events, workshops), providing a sense of sophistication, style, and warmth, with a hint of surprise. Haworth is registered to purse WELL Pilot Certification. Haworth has additionally committed to implementing the WELL Building Standard to another sector, in North America.

VIEW PUBLIC PROFILE
